Accumulated Local Effects 
-------------------------

These demonstrations of the accumulated local effects in scikit-explain
are generated from tutorial notebooks that are `available on GitHub <https://github.com/monte-flora/scikit-explain/blob/master/tutorial_notebooks/accumulated_local_effect_tutorial.ipynb>`_


General Use
=================
.. toctree::
    :glob:
    :maxdepth: 1

    notebooks/accumulated_local_effect_tutorial
    
    
Comparing Methods
=================
.. toctree::
    :glob:
    :maxdepth: 1

    notebooks/multiplots
